item.title: Everyday tools
item.description: Brain power saving Because there are so many things to worry about already. espanso Text expansion for terminals and everyday typing.

item.title: Good coding for your research
item.description: Handbook There’s no way around not coding in research these days. Patrick Mineault who was a neuroscientist and software engineer create this web book: The Good Research Code Handbook

item.title: How to graduate in D-ERDW, ETH ZÃ¼rich
item.description: During your study Publish at least one paper Nowhere is this specified, but every PhD student in ERDW is expected to do it.

item.title: Math and me
item.description: I wouldn’t say that I am good at math. Although I attended the most math-heavy program in geoscience you could find in Taiwan.

item.title: My Hero Academics
item.description: Self-promotion is something I struggle with for as long as I have memories. Imagine how bad I usually feel in a conference.

item.title: Open science
item.description: Back when I started the [[notes/prj-eqsim|fault system simulations]] as one of the PhD projects, there are not many open-sourced tools to start from.
